Package intellimate.izou.events

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventCallable  
    EventListener
    Interface for listening to events.
    EventsController
    This class can control the whether Events-Dispatcher get Fired or not.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Event
    This class represents an Event.
    EventBehaviourController
    This class can control the Behaviour of the the Event, like which Output-Plugin should get the Event first.
    EventDistributor
    This class gets all the Events from all registered EventPublisher, generates Resources and passes them to the OutputManager
    EventPublisher
    This class is used to pass Events to the EventDistributor
    LocalEventManager
    This class is used to manage local events.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LocalEventManager.MultipleEventsException Deprecated
    MultipleEventsException
    Exception thrown if there are multiple Events fired at the same time.
